entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon.
